Ich war schon Vorher ein Riesen Fan der Portal Reihe. Portal 1 ist zwar ein wenig kurz und der preis ist Beim ersten teil zu hoch doch im 2ten teil passt mir der preis ganz gut, Die story ist unfassbar mitreissend und cool und fÃ¼hr das Alter des Spieles ist Grafik, Spielmechanik, KomplexitÃ¤t und story wirklich gut. Ein klassiker denn man Gespielt haben sollte!
I still cant imagine how huge the entire facility is.
Best puzzle game I've ever played

I was scared this was going to be a sweaty gamer game that I wouldn't be able to play, so I avoided it for a while, but I was very wrong. It is hard, but It's still playable if you don't have good reflexes. There are so many different types of puzzles and each one is so different from each other, even the ones in the same chapter. usually puzzle games get boring after a while because once you've seen a few puzzles, you've seen them all, but I have been playing this for 12 hrs straight and I'm still getting new game mechanics. I'm not a huge gamer, so maybe these are things most people know about the game, but to those like me who know nothing about games and have a hard time with timing and dexterity based puzzles, I highly suggest this game. The plot is also great and the characters are hilarious. It's already become one of my new favorites.

The cake is a lie.

11 Years Later from release this game is AMAZING! The voice lines, The Levels, The seamless switch from level to level, the humor and the portals that just feel unreal. If only Valve made Portal 3, then the saga would be complete.
One of the greatest games, buy it if you aren't a goblin

An absolute must own for your library.  The puzzles are good, the writing and humor are great throughout, and the co-op puzzles are absolutely *chef's kiss*.  Truly a game worth your time on all accounts.
a very ood story, the pzzles are okay i guess

This game is one of the best single-player experiences to this day. Every thing is great about this game. The soundtrack, gameplay, comedy, and pacing is amazing. The game also runs smoothly, at least for my laptop and doesn't have lag spikes. Overall great game and worth the price.
Excelente juego de Puzzles, lo recomiendo bastante si te gusta resolver acertijos con una maquina que crea portales, definitivamente te gustarÃ¡,  ademÃ¡s de que tiene una buena historia :D
jeux tres originale mais bien casse tete !

Game is superior to many already existing games, its amazing and its able to run on my ageing laptop, relatively smoothly. I wish I played the first one before this to understand the story, but its fine. Great game, would recommend.

Promotes a good understanding of physics and develops problem solving skills. And it's wicked fun!
AÃ±ade mas gimmicks para un nueva experiencia y a su vez, refresca el argumento con una alianza inesperada.
I LOVE this game! Job well done valve. You are awesome
Greatest game of all time, we're never getting Portal 3

I love this game, the memories that this game holds are deer to me and I am so thankful to valve for making this game - I have many more hours but they are on the PS3. Since I first started playing video games portal 2 is one of the first, with its fun puzzles and gripping story, followed by a deep lore which takes you even further into the aperture world there is very little not to love. If you have not played this game before I cannot recommend it enough, the single player is so good you will wish that you could forget the story and play it all over again.

How long this comment will remain I do not know, how long it will be relevant I do not know, but one thing I am sure of is that portal 2 is one of the best overall games I have ever played since I began gaming in 2012 (along side MW2 which i'm sure many will agree is also at the top).

Greatest game I have ever played

the first game i got on steam got it on a sale but would have payed more then full price for this cause its fucking great the graphics decent not amazing but decent the story is basic but still satisfying to see unravel and they make up for the basic plot for the fucking fantastic dialogue world building and the characters (which there maybe few but well developed) i really understand everything that this facility was made for and stands for the ending is very satisfying and funny the whole of the game although the graphics aren't amazing as i said the visuals look great especially the later levels the puzzles and game play are so much fun and the coop as the same brilliant game play i never found any bugs this is probably in my top 3 favourite games 10/10
